      • getCar

        public Car getCar(java.lang.Long id)
        this method retrieves certain car from database. Car is chosen by incoming id
        Parameters:
        id - chosen's car id
        Returns:
        Car entity

      • getCars

        public java.util.List<Car> getCars()
        this method retrieves all cars from database
        Returns:
        List of Car entities

      • getCarsStatistic

        public java.util.List<CarStatistic> getCarsStatistic()
        this method retrieves statistic of how many times each car was ordered
        Returns:
        list of CarStatistic POJO representation entities

      • getCarUsedN

        public java.util.List<CarStatistic> getCarUsedN(java.lang.Long number)
        this method pulls out data about cars (car's id , car's model, how many times car was used) as POJO representation class CarStatistic. This information is sorted out by min required number of use(incoming parameter).
        Parameters:
        number - criteria to filter
        Returns:
        List of CarStatistic POJO classes

public void updateCar(Car car)

      • updatePrices

        @Transactional(propagation=MANDATORY)
public void updatePrices(double coef)
        Changing cars prices by multiplying on new coefficient
        Parameters:
        coef - incoming coefficient to multiply

      • updateCars

        public void updateCars(java.lang.Long newAmount)
        sets all prices of cars in the database equal to incoming value. This method was performed using Criteria API .
        Parameters:
        newAmount - new price to set

      • deleteCar

        public void deleteCar(java.lang.Long id)

        Parameters:
        id - of car that has to be deleted
